item.title: WAHA Hub
item.description: ⚠️ WAHA Hub in DEVELOPMENT yet… Consider using Dashboard for managing your sessions. Subscribe to WAHA PRO to speed up the development! ⚠️ Overview # WAHA Hub - central management solution to help your build reliable infrastructure with multiple WAHA servers! While Dashboard is a UI to manage your WhatsApp sessions on single server, WAHA Hub is a central management server to control and manage multiple servers in a single place.
